2:I[63327,["/_next/static/chunks/2fd32df42ef26f8b.js","/_next/static/chunks/f501513783488158.js"],"default"]
3:I[22016,["/_next/static/chunks/2fd32df42ef26f8b.js","/_next/static/chunks/f501513783488158.js"],""]
7:I[97367,["/_next/static/chunks/ff1a16fafef87110.js","/_next/static/chunks/d2be314c3ece3fbe.js"],"OutletBoundary"]
8:"$Sreact.suspense"
4:T2825,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">API Integration</h1>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Setting Up Docker Registry</h2>
Before using the UI, you need a running Docker Registry. Here are two methods:
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Method 1: Docker Run</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">docker run -d \
  --name docker-registry \
  -p 5001:5000 \
  -e REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED=true \
  -v registry-data:/var/lib/registry \
  registry:2
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Method 2: Docker Compose</h3>
Create a <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker-compose.yml</code> file:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">version: '3.8'

services:
  registry:
    image: registry:2
    container_name: docker-registry
    ports:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">"5001:5000"</li>
    environment:
      REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED: "true"
    volumes:
<li class="ml-4 text-gray-700">registry-data:/var/lib/registry</li>
    restart: unless-stopped

volumes:
  registry-data:
</code></pre>

<p class="text-gray-700 mb-4 leading-relaxed">Start the registry:</p>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">docker-compose up -d
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Verify Registry is Running</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Check registry health
curl http://localhost:5001/v2/
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Should return: {}</h1>
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Docker Registry v2 API</h2>
The UI integrates with Docker Registry v2 API endpoints to display repository and image information.
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Complete Flow: Pull to UI Display</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Example: nginx image</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># 1. Pull image from Docker Hub
docker pull nginx:latest
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">2. Tag for local registry</h1>
docker tag nginx:latest localhost:5001/nginx:latest
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">3. Push to local registry</h1>
docker push localhost:5001/nginx:latest
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">List Repositories</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">GET /v2/_catalog

Response:
{
  "repositories": [
    "nginx",
    "myapp",
    "postgres"
  ]
}
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">List Tags</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">GET /v2/&lt;repository&gt;/tags/list

Response:
{
  "name": "myapp",
  "tags": [
    "latest",
    "1.0",
    "1.1"
  ]
}
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Get Manifest (OCI Index - Multi-platform)</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">GET /v2/&lt;repository&gt;/manifests/&lt;tag&gt;
Accept: application/vnd.oci.image.index.v1+json

Response:
{
  "schemaVersion": 2,
  "mediaType": "application/vnd.oci.image.index.v1+json",
  "manifests": [
    {
      "mediaType": "application/vnd.oci.image.manifest.v1+json",
      "digest": "sha256:abc123...",
      "size": 1234,
      "platform": {
"architecture": "amd64",
"os": "linux"
      }
    }
  ]
}
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Get Actual Manifest Using Digest</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">GET /v2/&lt;repository&gt;/manifests/&lt;digest&gt;
Accept: application/vnd.oci.image.manifest.v1+json

Response:
{
  "schemaVersion": 2,
  "mediaType": "application/vnd.oci.image.manifest.v1+json",
  "config": {
    "mediaType": "application/vnd.oci.image.config.v1+json",
    "digest": "sha256:config123...",
    "size": 7234
  },
  "layers": [
    {
      "mediaType": "application/vnd.oci.image.layer.v1.tar+gzip",
      "digest": "sha256:layer1...",
      "size": 29123456
    },
    {
      "mediaType": "application/vnd.oci.image.layer.v1.tar+gzip",
      "digest": "sha256:layer2...",
      "size": 3456789
    }
  ]
}
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Delete Image</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">DELETE /v2/&lt;repository&gt;/manifests/&lt;digest&gt;

Response:
202 Accepted
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Size Calculation</h2>
The UI calculates image size by summing all layer sizes plus config size:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Calculate total size
curl -s -H "Accept: application/vnd.oci.image.manifest.v1+json" \
  http://localhost:5001/v2/nginx/manifests/sha256:abc123... \
  | jq '([.layers[].size] | add) + .config.size'
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Result: 32587479 bytes = 31.08 MB (compressed)</h1>
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">UI Backend API</h2>
The UI provides additional endpoints:
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Scan Image</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">POST /api/scan
Content-Type: application/json

{
  "registry_id": 1,
  "repository": "myapp",
  "tag": "1.0"
}

Response:
{
  "status": "success",
  "vulnerabilities": {...}
}
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Get Scan Results</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">GET /api/scan-results?registry_id=1&repository=myapp&tag=1.0

Response:
{
  "total": 42,
  "critical": 2,
  "high": 10,
  "medium": 20,
  "low": 10,
  "layers": [...]
}
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Authentication</h2>
Basic authentication is supported:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">Authorization: Basic base64(username:password)
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Using the Registry</h2>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Push an Image</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Tag an image for your registry
docker tag nginx:latest localhost:5001/nginx:latest
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Push to registry</h1>
docker push localhost:5001/nginx:latest
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Pull an Image</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Pull from registry
docker pull localhost:5001/nginx:latest
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">List Repositories via API</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># List all repositories
curl http://localhost:5001/v2/_catalog
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">List tags for a repository</h1>
curl http://localhost:5001/v2/nginx/tags/list
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Garbage Collection</h2>
Deleting tags only removes manifest references. To free disk space, run garbage collection:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Run garbage collection
docker exec docker-registry bin/registry garbage-collect /etc/docker/registry/config.yml
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Or with dry-run to preview</h1>
docker exec docker-registry bin/registry garbage-collect --dry-run /etc/docker/registry/config.yml
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Registry Configuration for Delete Operations</h2>
To enable delete operations, the registry must have <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED=true</code>. This is required for:


Deleting individual tags
Bulk delete operations
Cleanup workflows
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Important Notes</h2>

<strong class="text-gray-900">Compressed vs Uncompressed</strong>: Registry stores compressed layers, so sizes shown are compressed (smaller than <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker images</code> shows)
<strong class="text-gray-900">Multi-platform</strong>: OCI indexes contain multiple platform manifests (amd64, arm64, etc.)
<strong class="text-gray-900">Attestations</strong>: Skip manifests with <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">vnd.docker.reference.type: attestation-manifest</code>
<strong class="text-gray-900">Size Accuracy</strong>: Sizes are exact bytes from registry, not estimates
<strong class="text-gray-900">Delete Enabled</strong>: Must set <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">REGISTRY_STORAGE_DELETE_ENABLED=true</code> for delete operations0:{"buildId":"JcHhdlBJ6EkAu5YRxGD7t","rsc":["$","$1","c",{"children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$L2",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Getting Started","items":[{"id":"getting-started","title":"Installation","slug":"getting-started"},{"id":"configuration","title":"Configuration","slug":"configuration"}]},{"title":"Features","items":[{"id":"features","title":"Overview","slug":"features"},{"id":"security","title":"Security Scanning","slug":"security"},{"id":"bulk-operations","title":"Bulk Operations","slug":"bulk-operations"}]},{"title":"Examples","items":[{"id":"multi-registry","title":"Multi-Registry Setup","slug":"examples/multi-registry"},{"id":"basic-auth","title":"Basic Auth Registry","slug":"examples/basic-auth"}]},{"title":"Reference","items":[{"id":"api","title":"API Integration","slug":"api"},{"id":"development","title":"Development","slug":"development"},{"id":"testing","title":"Testing Guide","slug":"testing"}]}],"basePath":"/docker-registry-ui"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-8","children":["$","$L3",null,{"href":"/docker-registry-ui","className":"text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 flex items-center gap-1","children":"‚Üê Back to Docker Registry UI"}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Api"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-600 text-lg mb-8","children":"Api for Docker Registry UI"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$4"}}]]}]]}]}]]}],["$L5"],"$L6"]}],"loading":null,"isPartial":false}
